title: Announcer (Ansager) from Figurines: The Three-Dimensional Design of the Electro-Mechanical Show "Victory over the Sun" (Figurinen, die plastische Gestaltung der elektro-mechanischen Schau "Sieg über die Sonne")
medium: One from a portfolio of ten lithographs
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 13 3/4 x 11 7/8" (35 x 30.2 cm); sheet: 21 x 18" (53.3 x 45.7 cm)
